name: FlashDry Portable Complete Spill Kit - Yellow Duffle, Bag Tag, 15 Absorbent Pads, 2 3" x4' Sorbent Socks, Disposal Bags, Nitrile Gloves, 2 5L Buckets of 100% Organic Coir w/Dispenser Lid
short_description: FLASHDRY SPILL KITS: offer a comprehensive and portable solution for on-the-go spill cleanup and accidents. This all-in-one kit includes a yellow storage and carry bag, fifteen 15" x 17" universal spill absorbent pads, two 3" by 4' super-absorbent socks, two five-liter FlashDry buckets filled with 100% organic absorbent coir, instructions, bag tag, four Nitrile Gloves, and one discard bag for used absorbents. It's the ultimate lightweight and compact spill cleanup companion.

ALL-IN-ONE VERSATILE SOLUTION: This spill kit provides everything you need in a single package, ensuring you're fully equipped for all-purpose spill absorbency on the go. An essential for industrial workers, facility managers, warehouses, factories, facilities, airports, schools, and off-road vehicles in compliance with CA regulations. It helps contain and clean up any leaks, drips, and spills.

EASY TO STORE AND CARRY: The yellow storage and carry bag allows for convenient storage and effortless transportation, making it ideal for industrial workers, facility managers, tow trucks, emergency vehicles, airport runway vehicles, first responder vehicles, and construction sites. When filled with all our tools and accessories, the bag dimensions are 28"x10"x10".

LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE: Designed to be lightweight and portable, the spill kit weights only 9lbs and is easily stored or transported with our sturdy duffle. It offers ease of use and quick access to all the necessary tools for spill cleanup, ensuring fast response and containment.

REUSABLE, ORGANIC, ABSORBENT COIR: Unlike most spill kits, this kit includes two five-liter FlashDry buckets filled with 100% organic absorbent coir. It absorbs liquids multiple times its weight and is reusable, providing an eco-friendly and effective solution.

PRECISION DISPENSING LID: Our FlashDry 5L bucket comes with a dispenser lid, ensuring quick, accurate, and effortless application. The dispenser lid allows for precise control over spill coverage, minimizing waste and enhancing efficiency in critical cleanup situations.

name: AWF PRO Portable Economy Universal Spill Kit, 25 Pieces: Perfect for Trucks, Restaurants, Vehicles, and Homes. Contains Super Sorbent, Heavy Duty Pads, Socks, Hazmat Bags, & Gloves
short_description: PORTABLE SPILL KIT - Spills tend to happen when you least expect them and can catch you unprepared to deal with them. With AWF PRO Portable Spill Kits, you can be ready for the unexpected at a moment's notice. With its components fitting conveniently in a lightweight bag, AWF PRO Portable Spill Kits can be retrieved and stored with no hassle.

NON BIODEGRADABLE SORBENT - The Liquid and Oil Sorbent and Traction Agent soaks up fluids instantly, leaving a dry, safe anti-slip surface ready for immediate use. The sorbent absorbs industrial fluids such as solvents, grease, gasoline, paint, hydraulic, heating and lubricating oils and turns it into fireproof, non hazardous solid waste.

AWESOME VALUE - Look no further for the best value portable economy spill kit. Each AWF PRO Portable Sorbent Spill Kit includes: Zippered Bag (1), 2 QT Universal Sorbent Carton (1), Universal Spill Pads (15), 3"x4' Universal Spill Socks (2), Hazmat Disposal Bags (5), Pair of Nitrile Gloves (1).
FOR USE AS A UNIVERSAL SORBENT - Apply Super Sorbent on and around spill. Rub Super Sorbent in with a broom or shovel. Immediately sweep up saturated sorbent and dispose of in appropriate manner.

FOR USE AS A TRACTION AGENT - Lightly shake Super Sorbent on floors, ramps, stairs, and walkways to provide traction, while being careful not to over apply. As Super Sorbent becomes saturated, simply sweep up and re-apply as needed.
product_description: Our AWF PRO Portable Economy Sorbent Spill Kit features one 2-quart carton of Safety Sorbent Traction Agent And Universal Sorbent that helps you meet the requirements of OSHA 1910.22, Parts 1, 2 and 3 on walking and working surfaces. Safety Sorbent is a blend of all natural ingredients that safely soak up virtually and liquids from any surface. It is 100% pure Amorphous Material without any fillers or additives. Safety Sorbent is an inert and inorganic mixture of chemically and physically bound silicates, aluminates with a small amount of ferric oxide, calcium oxide, magnesium oxide, potassium oxide and alkalis and contains no free elements. Its physical shape is flat and thin with generally one bubble juncture per shard allowing for higher capacity and faster capillary action. Applications include traffic accident response, shipping and receiving facilities, manufacturing and machining operations, chemical manufacturing and blending, maintenance and repair services, refuse collection operators, aircraft refueling and repair operations, cold storage and refrigerated trucking, meat and poultry processing, and food processors. NOTE: Super Sorbent is not for use on hydrofluoric acid or HF compounds.
